aim To investigate the effect of extracting ursolic acid from Fructus Corni with SFE CO2 and refluent ethanol extraction .目的考察超临界CO2法、乙醇回流法提取山茱萸中熊果酸的效果。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin refluent- 'flowing back', from the verb refluere, from re- 'back' + fluere 'to flow'
